speak: Watch Dogs 2 (2016) by Ubisoft Montreal is an open-world action-adventure game set in San Francisco. Players control Marcus Holloway, a hacker in DedSec fighting the surveillance system, ctOS. The game offers various mission approaches, with cooperative multiplayer and improved mechanics over its predecessor. It received praise for its hacking gameplay, characters, and setting, selling over 10 million copies by 2020.
